content: through two loops to the end of the row finishing your work when you have 3 bars left on your hook do a regular forward and return pass two more times to finish off go through 1 bar like usual pull up one loop and do a slip_stitch two times cut yarn and fasten_off block your scarf repeating row increase part number of row 4 row 5 row 6 row 7 repeats increase sdec 1 5 5 4 4 2 6 6 5 5 3 7 7 6 6 4 8 8 7 7 5 9 9 8 8 6 10 10 9 9 thank you for downloading my pattern i would love to see your work in progress or finished scarf tag me and your scarf on instagram for me to be able to see your beautiful makes tag me in your photos using @tess crochet and #supersimplestitch <3 for any questions you might have please contact me by email tess crochet1@gmail com for personal use only copying or reselling is not allowed ©2020 terese auestad
